name: Swivel Shooter
description:
A brutally difficult top-down shooter with a simple concept: you always shoot through the center point of the screen. Instead of aiming your attacks, focus on precise movements and positioning to avoid enemies and lead them to their deaths.

Perfect for quick play sessions while in queue for another game, or when you need a few minutes to blow.

____________________________

This is my first game and it was created with the Godot engine. I'd really appreciate feedback and support of any kind, thank you!

Follow me on Twitter: @austintradr
